content: this is ayame from the anime/manga fruits basket he represents the year of the snake in the chinese zodiac i want to make all 14 of the main characters of fruits basket the 12 zodiac the cat and tohru plus if i have time hanajima and uo-chan for this project i used magicatt s snake 1 as a model for what i wanted to do i m interested in seeing everyone else s snakes 1 http //www ravelry com/projects/magicatt/snake
